events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has multiple scratches and a faulty screen. It doesn't function properly at all.
The issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to the reported scratches and malfunctioning screen.
Your case has been assigned to our technical support agent for further assistance regarding your defective product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your product. I’m here to help you get this resolved as soon as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the faulty screen so we can assess the problem more accurately?
I have attached clear pictures showing the damage. The screen won’t turn on and the scratches are quite deep.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, please. I still want to use this product but only if it works correctly.
We have processed the replacement order and it will be shipped to your address within 3 business days.
Just checking in to ensure the replacement product arrived and is working properly. Please let us know if you need further help.
Since we have not received further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for working with us to resolve this matter.
